General.Name: China Express Airlines Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: China Express Airlines Co.,LTD engages in the regional aviation business in China. The company operates through operation bases located in Guiyang, Chongqing, Dalian, Inner Mongolia, Xi'an, and Xinjiang with approximately 100 routes to approximately 100 domestic destinations. China Express Airlines Co.,LTD was founded in 2006 and is based in Guiyang, China.
General.Address: Airport Hotel, Annex Building, Guiyang, China, 550012
